{"city": "Vallejo", "state": "CA", "name": "Community Produce Program", "address": "3615 Georgia St,", "phone": "707-654-4673", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food Vallejo Printer Friendly List Community Produce Program Families and individuals can pick up to 20 pounds of FREE fresh produce twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Castlewood Church , 3615 Georgia St, Vallejo , 1st & 3rd Monday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Emmanuel Apostolic Church , 900 6th St, Vallejo , 2nd & 4th Tuesday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Griffin Academy , 233 Hobbs Ave, Vallejo , 1st & 3rd Tuesday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. JFK Library , 505 Santa Clara St, Vallejo , 2nd & 4th Saturday 10:00-11:00am.
							Please bring two bags with handles. La Clinica North , 220 Hospital Dr, Vallejo , 1st & 3rd Thursday 9:30-10:30am.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Solano Middle School , 1025 Corcoran Ave, Vallejo , 2nd & 4th Friday 4:00-5:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Taylor Chapel CME Church , 1203 Louisiana St, Vallejo , 2nd & 4th Friday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Vallejo High School , 840 Nebraska St, Vallejo , 1st & 3rd Tuesday 4:00-5:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. WIC Vallejo , 365 Tuolumne St, Vallejo , 2nd & 4th Tuesday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Mobile Pantry Distribution Families and individuals can pick up FREE fresh produce, proteins, dairy and a variety of nonperishable food once or twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Child Start- Vallejo , 1328 Virginia St, Vallejo , 3rd Wednesday 10:00am-12:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. North Vallejo Community Center , 1121 Whitney Ave, Vallejo , 3rd Saturday 10:00am-12:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. The Hill Church , 210 Locust Dr, Vallejo , 1st & 3rd Wednesday 3:00-4:00pm.
							Park anywhere in the parking lot and walk up to the Handicap parking area to get checked in. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Amador St. Hope Center , 929 Amador St, Vallejo , Wednesday 10:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 707-654-4673 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Antioch COGIC , 21 Antioch Dr, Vallejo , 1st & 3rd Thursday 11:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 707-641-5276 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Boys & Girls Empowerment Group , 1624 Fairgrounds Dr Ste C, Vallejo , Thursday & Saturday 10:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 707-657-1726 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Bridgeway Cornerstone Church , 1505 Georgia St, Vallejo , Monday 9:30-10:00am. Phone: 707-652-5300 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Calvary Community Church (Drive-Thru), 585 Mini Dr, Vallejo , 4th Saturday 10:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 707-373-9459 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Catholic Charities of Solano , 125 Corporate Pl Ste A, Vallejo , Monday-Thursday 9:00am-4:30pm.
							By appointment only. Call between 9:00-11:00am to make an appointment. Services only offered to veterans and unhoused individuals. Phone: 707-644-8909 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Emmanuel Apostolic Church , 900 6th St, Vallejo , Monday 10:30-11:30am
2nd & 4th Tuesday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Mainly produce provided at this location. Phone: 707-642-2391 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Faith Food Fridays , 826 Solano Ave, Vallejo , Friday 10:00am-4:00pm
Sunday 9:00 am-12:30pm.
							Participants must be in line at least 15 minutes before closing to receive food. Friday distributions are held in the ministry center. Sunday distributions are in the church parking lot across the street. Please call to confirm current hours. Phone: 707-557-7933 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Food is Free Bay Area , 900 Fairgrounds Dr, Vallejo , Tuesday & Thursday 4:00-6:00pm.
							Enter via Sage St. Gate, Located in McCormack Hall. Additional distributions listed on Food is Free Bay Area's calendar at www.fifbayarea.org. Phone: 707-690-0945 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Friendship Missionary Baptist Church , 1905 Florida St, Vallejo , 4th Saturday 8:00am – open until all food or supplies are given out. Phone: 707-648-2005 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Good Samaritan Missionary Baptist , 407 Capitol St, Vallejo , Thursday 10:00-11:00am. Phone: 707-553-1896 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Old Path COGIC , 500 Arkansas St, Vallejo , 1st & 3rd Saturday 10:00-11:00am. Phone: 707-643-7788 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Rebuilding Together Solano (Drive-Thru), 2800 Georgia St, Vallejo , Thursday 12:00-12:30pm (for seniors and veterans) & 12:30-1:00pm (open to all).
							12:00-12-30pm time slot is for seniors and veterans only. 12:30-1:00pm time slot is open to everyone. Phone: 707-580-9360 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Salvation Army Vallejo , 630 Tuolumne St, Vallejo , Tuesday 9:00am-12:00pm and 1:00-3:00pm
& Thursday 9:00am-12:00pm.
							Proof of address is required. Bring ID for proof. Phone: 707-439-7980 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Second Baptist Church of Vallejo (Drive-Thru), 1170 Benicia Rd, Vallejo , 1st & 3rd Wednesday 8:30-10:00am. Phone: 707-643-6496 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Shiloh COGIC (Drive-Thru), 501 Lemon St, Vallejo , Thursday 11:00am-12:00pm – open until all food or supplies are given out. Phone: 707-917-6941 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Basil Conference (SVdP) , 1225 Tuolumne St, Vallejo , .
							By appointment only. Call to make a reservation. Phone: 707-644-0376 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. The Journey Church (Drive-Thru), 201 Doyle St, Vallejo , 1st & 3rd Saturday 10:00-11:00am. Phone: 510-407-4524 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Vallejo Seventh-day Adventist Community Services , 1130 Alabama St, Vallejo , Tuesday 9:00am-12:00pm. (Closed: September 2, November 11, December 23) . Phone: 707-557-2267 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Partner Soup Kitchen Soup kitchens provide FREE meals to anyone who comes in during meal hours. Menus vary, although each soup kitchen tries to offer balanced meals. First Baptist Church of Vallejo , 2025 Sonoma Blvd, Vallejo , Monday-Thursday 11:00am-12:00pm
Saturday 2:30-3:30am
Sunday 5:00-6:00pm.
							Clothing, laundry service and shower facilities are offered at this location. Phone: 707-644-4087 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Florence Douglas Senior Center , 333 Amador St, Vallejo , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 10:00-11:00am.
							The distribution is located at the back of the building. Norman King Community Center , 545 Magazine St, Vallejo , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 9:30-10:30am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
Fairfield, CA 94533 GET HELP Find Food CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Contact Us 855-309-FOOD (3663) info@foodbankccs.org How to Help Ways to Give Donate Food Volunteer Advocate Become a Partner Agency Food Bank Updates Blog Events Newsroom Newsletter Sign-up Careers Facebook Twitter Youtube Instagram Linkedin 501(c)(3) Organization | Federal Tax ID# 94-2418054 Copyright © 2025 Cookie Settings This institution is an equal opportunity provider | Site Map | Privacy Policy Website Design and Development by MIGHTYminnow", "latitude": 38.099929694133, "longitude": -122.21298147096, "source": "food_bank_of_contra_costa_and_solano_ca", "food_bank": "Food Bank of Contra Costa and Solano"}
